bigraph module¶

This module provides an ADT for the project.

Libraries an packages: numpy ctypes

class bigraph.Array(size)¶

Bases: object

An array based on C array.

clear(value)¶

Clears the array by setting each element to the given value.

Parameters

value – value

Returns

None

class bigraph.Bigraph¶

Bases: object

This class represents a bipartite graph and uses dictionary, numpy array and DynamicArray data types.

Methods defined here:

__setitem__(incentive, reactions): Adds a new incentive with its reactions to the bigraph.

__getitem__(word): Rturns the reactions for given incentive.

__iter__(): Returns an iterator through bigraph’s incentives.

get_incentives(word): Returns a set of incentives for given reaction.

get_incentives(word)¶

Returns a set of incentives for given reaction.

Word

Returns
